thread.title: Beyoncé Curates Playlist of Jay Z Collaborations: Listen

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: Beyoncé Curates Playlist of Jay Z Collaborations: Listen

persons.name: beyoncé curates playlist of jay z collaborations

text:
Beyoncé Curates Playlist of Jay Z Collaborations: Listen “Crazy in Love,” “Drunk in Love,” and beyond Photo by Lester Cohen/Getty Images for NARAS 
Following her appearance with Jay Z on DJ Khaled’s new song “ Shining ,” Beyoncé has curated an playlist of their collaborations for Tidal . The playlist, also called “Shining,” consists of 9 songs that she and Jay Z have appeared on together, including “'03 Bonnie and Clyde,” “Crazy in Love,” “Deja Vu,” “Drunk in Love,” and more. It also includes Jay's Magna Carta Holy Grail interlude “Beach Is Better,” which does not feature Bey but does include the lines “You better look like Halle Berry...or Beyoncé / Shit then we getting married.” Listen to the whole thing below. 
Beyoncé recently announced that she and Jay Z are having twins and brought her husband to tears with an incredible Grammys performance . Read our feature, “ The Rap Pact: How Jay Z and Hot 97 Combined Forces to Take Over Hip-Hop .” Artists In This Story
